ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and International 3G compatibility via 2100 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
2.0 megapixel camera with 8x digital zoom; handsfree speakerphone with noise-cancelling CrystalTalk Technology
Bluetooth connectivity for both communication headsets and music headphones; USB 2.0; MicroSD expansion
Up to 3.5 hours of talk time, up to 260 hours (10.8 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR2 V9 Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, International 3G, Media Player, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Graphite Gray)
